title: Feedback-Based Language Simulation Education Design: Learner-Driven Knowledge Construction Process

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based experiential learning in language domains for professional learners (medical/legal/technical), enabling self-directed learning through feedback in simulated work environments

learning_goals: Learners improve language expression accuracy by over 30% through five or more feedback cycles in a simulation/VR environment.

Learners analyze at least three feedbacks from peers and AI systems, develop two concrete improvement plans within 24 hours, and apply them to actual assignments (e.g., presentation materials, reports).
Learners systematically document feedback utilization strategies and write self-reflection reports in project-based assessment tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
